name: Rogue Infinite Mecha
description: Si-Fi rogue-like, top-down shooter. Advance through the overrun facility by defeating the monsters that populate each room. Use power-ups and abilities to conquer the map, stay agile and move frequently to best your enemis, as there are seven unique types to challenge. Defeat all enemies and confrent the Pyro-Demon who awaits you in the end. Will you survive?
